name: No Substitutions
description:
This is a word substitution game made for Gaming Like It's 1927. Explore eight real passages from a "domestic science" book, then swap out words found elsewhere in the book. Foods and Cookery by Mary Lockwood Matthews; Boston, Little, Brown, and company; filed Jan. 5, 1927. Coding and substituting by Caroline Delbert. "My Blue Heaven" by Walter Donaldson, arranged and performed by Martijn Fraser.

Content warnings for food and health. Full screen is recommended.
